entities.name: George
entities.description: George is mentioned as speaking and interacting with other characters. He says 'You'll be able to tell us apart now, anyway, Mum.' (line 5) and asks Harry if he's okay (line 7).

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being greeted by George (line 8) and later walking outside with Ginny (line 14). He seems to be worried about Ron and Bill (line 10).

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as not being back yet (line 11) and expected to return soon (line 15).

entities.name: Bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as not being back yet (line 11) and expected to return soon.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as walking outside with Harry (line 14).

entities.name: Mrs. Weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as speaking to George and telling him that Ron and Bill are not back yet.

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as expected to return with Ron soon (line 15).

entities.name: Auntie Muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is mentioned as being close to the Burrow.

entities.name: the Burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as Harry's destination and Auntie Muriel's location.

relationships.description: Ron and Tonks are expected to return together (line 15).
